. 4 -
SUMMARY
The MEB is requesting an extension of its contract No. OE 3-l6-CX)7 and
an amendment of the budget to carry out the requirements of the contract.
Because of various delays in the developnent to date, the extension is
required to cover the period during which films will be produced, and
the distribution and evaluation of the films can be made.
The request calls for an extension of the contract from August 31^ 19^^^
to June 30, I965, and requires a total budget amendment involving a total
of $15,9^3-00.
William G. Harley
President
Enclosure
